synopsis.text: Tachibana and Tezuka, Erika Shinohara feels the pressure to invent a fictitious boyfriend to avoid feeling left out. In a desperate move, she snaps a photo of an attractive stranger, only to discover that he's Kyoya Sata, a popular student at her school. To keep her secret safe, Erika begs Kyoya to play along, but he seizes the opportunity to manipulate her instead. By forcing Erika to act like his "dog," Kyoya reveals his true nature as a cruel sadist hidden beneath his charming facade. Despite the humiliating treatment, Erika starts developing genuine feelings for him. As she navigates through Kyoya's complex personality, she wonders if there's a chance for true love or if she's doomed to remain his "wolf girl." Embark on a rollercoaster of emotions in Wolf Girl & Black Prince, where lies and love intertwine in unexpected ways.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
